title: ［代post］ 數碼安全指引 (發夢者特別適用)

replies.msg:
有個Tech朋友上個禮拜寫左呢個非常簡單直接既數碼安全指引 (Digital Safety Guideline)，嚟緊監控只會越來越全面，我地一定要加強保護自己既身份同私隱。

雖然有啲可能已經知，但都請大家出門口發夢前花啲時間睇下！
保護自己！！！！

My tech friends made this really simple and direct Digital Safety Guideline last week. It’s practical and useful. Even though not all of us are frontline protesters/ human rights defenders, I suggest we all take extra steps to protect our privacy because surveillance will only become more all-encompassing. （You can find the link to the English version in the link below）
